New Records: Alek Thomas became the first player in Diamondbacks history to hit a pinch-hit two-run home run in the 8th inning of an NLCS game
Gabriel Moreno recorded an RBI single in the 9th inning to tie the series
Key Match Events: A dramatic, score-tying, pinch-hit two-run homer from Alek Thomas off Craig Kimbrel in the 8th inning
A go-ahead RBI single from Gabriel Moreno four batters later
A bullpen game that kept the score close despite a shaky start from Cristopher Sanchez
Pre-Game Insights: Diamondbacks manager Torey Lovullo emphasized the team's resilience and young core's ability to perform under pressure
The Diamondbacks were underdogs entering the NLCS but showed no fear in their performance
Post-Match Reflections: Diamondbacks players and manager expressed pride in the team's comeback win and their ability to tie the series
The victory highlighted the team's young roster's potential and determination
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a thrilling and historic moment for the Diamondbacks organization
The Diamondbacks' win marked their second in the NLCS, tying the series and showing their competitive spirit
Others: The Diamondbacks' victory demonstrated their ability to perform in high-pressure situations despite a lower payroll compared to the Phillies
